meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7957.

td.p: Emma Badame, a digital marketing manager from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
John Shortino, a software developer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Dave Scatena, a chemical engineer from San Francisco, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $23,200)

tr.td: BABY'S FIRST INSTAGRAM
IT HAPPENED IN SOUTH AMERICA
ONE T, DOUBLE T
BIRTHPLACE OF A BRAND
(Alex: Name the state of origin.)
WE HOLD THESE TRUTHS
TO BE ELF-EVIDENT

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Nearly 800,000 follow Boomer, who is seen in a few pools; natural, since Dad is this 23-time Olympic gold-winning guy')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Nearly 800,000 follow Boomer, who is seen in a few pools; natural, since Dad is this 23-time Olympic gold-winning guy
